revised_title: The Production and Properties of Furfurol and its Compounds
tldr: The author investigates the production of furfurol, an essential oil, from various plant materials using sulfuric acid. He also examines its properties and compounds, such as furfuramide and meta-furfurol, and their reactions with other substances. Furfurol is found to have unique characteristics that set it apart from other essential oils.
